text: Be kind and have compassion for others, anyone his situation can change in a minute
Be kind as if life is for love and kindness.
Be kind enough to love those who don't deserve your love.

Be kind for as much as you can, but when you feel your limits are being pushed, and the thing inside you begin to stir. Warn them once about it and if they still do not listen. Then, unleash the dragon they pinched.
Be kind like a flower and know that life is beautiful like springtime.
Be kind like a flower to fill the world with beauty, joy and happiness.
Be kind to UNKIND people.They need it the most.
Be kind to all and rude to no one.
Be kind to all and trust all. If you do so, only a few will break your trust.
Be kind to all living things. Nature notices everything.
Be kind to all pets and animals because they will be kind back to you.
Be kind to all the people you meet on your journey.
Be kind to be awesome.
Be kind to dragons, for thou art crunchy when toasted and taste good with ketchup. (Sebastian)
Be kind to every body and every body will be kind to you.
Be kind to every person you meet because we don't know their battles.
Be kind to everyone you meet.Give a little bit of yourself to mankind.
Be kind to everyone, everyone is going through something
Be kind to express your love for life. No reason is needed to be kind.
Be kind to him who does not deserve your kindness.
Be kind to humanity, she is very lonely, everyone is busy with themselves.
Be kind to one another and seek beauty in all you do.
Be kind to one another. Bye, bye.
Be kind to one another. Karma will be swift or slow but she will always come.
Be kind to others and you will find that others are kind to you. Being positive will spread positivity back to you. If you give out a pleasant energy, you will receive a pleasant energy.
Be kind to others as you would like them to be to you.Encourage ,don't discourage.
Be kind to others—not because they deserve kindness—but because you deserve inner peace.
Be kind to people and don’t judge, for you do not know what demons they carry and what battles they are fighting.
Be kind to people whether they deserve your kindness or not. If your kindness reaches the deserving good for you if your kindness reaches the undeserving take joy in your compassion.
Be kind to the hawk and harm the sparrow.
Be kind to your future self, and your future will be kind to you.
Be kind to yourself and others.
Be kind to yourself, so you can be happy enough to be kind to the world.

Be kind to yourself. Remember that when you abuse yourself, you will experience the anger, regret, and apathy of the bully as well as the depression, anxiety, and insecurity of the victim. Whatever you do, be kind to yourself.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible. And be kinder than is necessary.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.-Dalai Lama
Be kind whenever, you can.
Be kind! Give small things with great love.
Be kind! Go and burn the world with the fire of your love.
Be kind, be all sympathy,For each and every human beingIs forced to fight against himself.
Be kind, be fair and be just.
Be kind, because everyone is having a really hard time.
Be kind, don't judge, and have respect for others. If we can all do this, the world would be a better place. The point is to teach this to the next generation.
Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a battle you know nothing about.
Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle.
Be kind, for the other is not another, but your mirrored kine.
Be kind, for whenever kindness becomes part of something, it beautifies it. Whenever it is taken from something, it leaves it tarnished.
Be kind. Always if you have a choice, be kind.
Be kind. Be compassionate. Be love. Be original. Be authentic. Be peace. Be yourself. BE.
Be kind. Be happy. Be free.

Be kind. Be kind to others, be kind to animals, be kind to yourself. Smile at the mailman, pet your dog, buy yourself an ice cream cone. Spreading kindness in this world is the noblest thing a person can do.
Be kind. It will reveal your true inner beauty.
Be kind. It's worthwhile to make an effort to learn about other people and figure out what you might have in common with them.
Be kind. Only feelings of kindness can purify our ever judgemental minds.
Be kind. We never know what people are going through. Give grace and mercy because one day your circumstance could change and you may need it.
Be knowledgeable but humble. Be wise and simple.
Be knowledgeable, but not realistic!
Be knowledgeable.Be logical.Be affable.Be trustable.
Be led by your talent, not by your self-loathing; those other things you just have to manage.
Be leery of silence. It doesn't mean you won the argument. Often, people are just busy reloading their guns.
Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.

Be less generous with your advice: live it instead. It is a bad situation when someone with a coughing fit attempts to sell a cough mixture. After all, action speaks far louder than words; living the example is the best advice you can ever give. Only examples have children.
Be less than what you are so that you can become more.” ― Joseph Delaney, The Spook's Sacrifice
Be less the general and more a father. Hold her close at night and chase the shadows away.
Be life.
Be like God. He is the mighty being that dwells in you.
Be like Jesus. Live love, speak love, think love…..do all things in love.
Be like a branch of a tree
Be like a duck, paddling and working very hard inside the water, but what everyone sees is a smiling and calm face.
Be like a fresh flowing stream.
Be like a mountain
Be like a peacock and dance with all of your beauty.
Be like a postage stamp-stick to one thing until you get there.
Be like a postage stamp. Stick to it until you get there

Be like a rocky promontory against which the restless surf continually pounds; it stands fast while the churning sea is lulled to sleep at its feet. I hear you say, How unlucky that this should happen to me! Not at all! Say instead, How lucky that I am not broken by what has happened and am not afraid of what is about to happen. The same blow might have struck anyone, but not many would have absorbed it without capitulation or complaint.
Be like a rose; no matter how many thorns you encounter in life, bloom.
Be like a star and shine, whether people care or do not care; the clouds are temporary, but your beauty is permanent.
Be like a tree, bloom like a flower, sing like a bird, and dance like a peacock.
Be like a water who creates his own path don't be like a stone who stops everyone's path
Be like nature—quiet, calm, loving, and persistent. Don’t hurry. Flowers will bloom.
Be like seeds; do not see dirt thrown at you as your enemy, but as ground to grow.
Be like stars; instead of cursing the darkness, shine.
Be like stars; when darkness tries to stop you from shining, shine all the more.
Be like the bird that  passing on her flight awhile on boughs too slight  feels them give way beneath her  and yet sings  knowing that she hath wings.
Be like the bird that  passing on her flight awhile on boughs too slight  feels them give way beneath her  and yet sings  knowing that she hath wings.
Be like the date that grows sweeter and sweeter , even though the soil that nourishes it is rocky and harsh
Be like the flower that gives its fragrance to even the hand that crushes it.
Be like the flower, content with its nature.
Be like the koru; as you go forward into the forever-changing future, always remain faithful to the point of origin.
Be like the moon, give everyone your love and smiles.
Be like the moon—reflect lights of love from within.
Be like the sun

Be like the sun for grace and mercy. Be like the night to cover others' faults. Be like running water for generosity. Be like death for rage and anger. Be like the Earth for modesty. Appear as you are. Be as you appear.
Be like the sun who fell in love with the moon and shared all his light.
Be like the sun; bear with those in the dark, but keep shining your light.
Be like the sun; warm to everyone, even your enemies.

Be like water making its way through cracks. Do not be assertive, but adjust to the object, and you shall find a way around or through it. If nothing within you stays rigid, outward things will disclose themselves. Empty your mind, be formless. Shapeless, like water. If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. You put water into a bottle and it becomes the bottle. You put it in a teapot, it becomes the teapot. Now, water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend.

Be like water making its way through cracks. Do not be assertive, but adjust to the object, and you shall find a way round or through it. If nothing within you stays rigid, outward things will disclose themselves.Empty your mind, be formless. Shapeless, like water. If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. You put water into a bottle and it becomes the bottle. You put it in a teapot it becomes the teapot. Now, water can flow or it can crash. Be water my friend.
